tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE message_content (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    media_content BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    message_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE multimedia_content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT,
    content_type TEXT,
    content_url TEXT,
    upload_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE text_messages (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sender TEXT,
   receiver TEXT,
   message_text TEXT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE multimedia_content (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   title TEXT,
   content_type TEXT,
   content_url TEXT,
   upload_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE message_attachments (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   message_id INT,
   attachment_type TEXT,
   attachment_url TEXT);
CREATE TABLE text_messages ( message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_id INT NOT NULL, message_text TEXT NOT NULL, sent_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE multimedia_content ( content_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, content_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, content_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, uploaded_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, uploaded_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE message_attachments ( attachment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, message_id INT NOT NULL, content_id INT NOT NULL, attachment_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL );
